apps.name: Auto Speech Recognition
apps.description: Convert speech to text using AI magic!
apps.image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><text x="50" y="50" font-size="60" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="central" fill="#00FFFF">🎙️</text></svg>

apps.name: Embedding Generator
apps.description: Turn your CSV data into fancy AI embeddings!
apps.image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><text x="50" y="50" font-size="60" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="central" fill="#00FFFF">📊</text></svg>

apps.name: Code Completer
apps.description: Watch AI finish your code like a mind reader!
apps.image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><text x="50" y="50" font-size="60" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="central" fill="#00FFFF">💻</text></svg>

apps.name: Sentiment Checker
apps.description: See if your words are happy, sad, or somewhere in between!
apps.image: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 100 100"><text x="50" y="50" font-size="40" text-anchor="middle" dominant-baseline="central" fill="#00FFFF">😊😐😠</text></svg>

apps.name: Rock Paper Scissors
apps.description: Play the classic game with a retro twist!

apps.name: Emoji Terrain Game
apps.description: Navigate through a terrain made of emojis in this simple Phaser game.

apps.name: Chess Game
apps.description: Play chess with emoji pieces in this simple Phaser game.

apps.name: Emoji Snake Game
apps.description: Play the classic Snake game with emojis!

apps.name: Emoji Platformer
